name: Yaqeen Institute for Islamic Research
mission: Books Yaqeen Books provides high-quality, well-researched Islamic books and ebooks focused on providing practical solutions to contemporary problems.
theoryOfChange: Yaqeen Institute for Islamic Research has a published document titled 'Faithful Activism: A Sunnah Framework'. This document is described as instructional notes formulated for a course, aiming to provide a systematic treatment and a guiding framework for Muslims to engage in healthy civic participation in various social spaces. It outlines 'part platform and part procedural approach—the what and the how—to achieve this aim,' focusing on 'Preservation of faith' and 'Participation with faith' to inspire active involvement in building a better society based on scriptural imperative.
zakatClaimEvidence: Dedicated zakat page found at https://yaqeeninstitute.org/zakat (Source: https://yaqeeninstitute.org/zakat)

ui_signals_v1.recommendation_rationale: Good donor alignment with manageable risk. Evidence quality is solid but still evolving in places.

components.evidence: Explicit zakat program (+4); Muslim-focused organization (+2); Islamic identity (+1); Humanitarian service (+2)
components.improvement_suggestion: Clarify zakat allocation policy and eligible use categories for donors.

alignment.rationale: Alignment 28/50: MEDIUM Muslim donor fit, advocacy cause area

components.evidence: No beneficiary data available for cost-per-beneficiary scoring; high program ratio (≥85%) suggests efficient delivery

all_citations.claim: The organization holds a Charity Navigator score of 96.0/100 and maintains strong financial accountability.
The charity is zakat-eligible and maintains a specific zakat policy.
Total revenue reached $8,759,241 with a program expense ratio of 86.1%.
The institute produces research papers and educational content to address contemporary problems.
The organization tracks impact through digital views of its Ramadan series and students using its curriculum.
The organization provides various donation options and giving methods for supporters.

baseline_narrative.amal_score_rationale: The organization earns a solid overall rating due to its exceptional financial health and high program spending, though its impact score is moderated by its focus on capacity building rather than direct service delivery.
areas_for_improvement: Expanding direct beneficiary impact data beyond digital engagement metrics
Enhancing cause urgency alignment to move from advocacy toward high-priority humanitarian or social interventions

dimension_explanations.alignment: Yaqeen shows a medium donor fit as it serves a specific niche in Islamic advocacy and education [3]. The organization has established a reliable track record in the research space and provides clear pathways for zakat-eligible giving [2][9].
dimension_explanations.impact: The institute demonstrates strong operational effectiveness with a Charity Navigator score of 96.0/100 and a program expense ratio of 86.1% [1]. While it successfully reaches a large audience through its Ramadan series and curriculum, its primary impact model is capacity building through research and infographics [4][8].

baseline_narrative.headline: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc addresses contemporary challenges through high-quality Islamic research and educational resources.
strengths: High program expense ratio of 86.1%, ensuring the vast majority of funds support core research and educational initiatives
Exceptional fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised, indicating highly cost-effective donor acquisition
Strong liquidity with 12.0 months of working capital available to sustain operations
baseline_narrative.summary: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc is a research-focused organization that produces scholarly books, ebooks, and multimedia content to provide practical solutions to modern problems [3][4]. The institute maintains a high standard of financial transparency and is recognized as zakat-eligible for eligible donor contributions [1][2].

alignment.explanation: Yaqeen is a strong fit for donors prioritizing intellectual dawah, featuring <cite id="7">verified zakat eligibility</cite> and a focus on Islamic identity.
alignment.improvement: The organization could <cite id="18">clarify its zakat allocation policy</cite> to better define which asnaf categories are served by research activities.

credibility.explanation: Donors can trust Yaqeen due to its <cite id="11">Platinum Seal of Transparency</cite> and a <cite id="14">96/100 accountability score</cite> from Charity Navigator.
credibility.improvement: To strengthen credibility, the institute should work toward <cite id="17">meeting all 20 BBB Wise Giving Alliance standards</cite>, particularly regarding board compensation and oversight.

rich_narrative.headline: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc addresses contemporary challenges through high-quality Islamic research and educational resources.

ideal_donor_profile.best_for_summary: Best for donors who value intellectual dawah and want to fund the creation of high-quality Islamic content that counters modern misconceptions.
donor_motivations: Want to support the intellectual defense of Islamic orthodoxy
Value high-production multimedia and scholarly research
Prefer supporting established organizations with massive digital footprints
Seek to fulfill zakat through educational and dawah-based avenues
giving_considerations: Impact is measured primarily through reach and engagement rather than direct humanitarian relief
The organization is in a growth phase with a 3.5% revenue CAGR
Donations support a centralized research team rather than local community chapters
ideal_donor_profile.not_ideal_for: Donors seeking immediate, tangible humanitarian outcomes like food or medical aid, or those who prioritize local community center operations.

impact_evidence.evidence_grade_explanation: Grade C reflects strong tracking of output metrics (views, students reached) but a lack of independent, third-party impact evaluations.
impact_evidence.theory_of_change_summary: Yaqeen aims to inspire a world of faithful changemakers by reviving the essence of orthodoxy through research and curriculum.
impact_evidence.why_evidence_matters: Evidence in research helps prove that educational content actually changes perceptions and strengthens faith.

long_term_outlook.room_for_funding_explanation: As a global digital platform, Yaqeen can absorb significant funding to expand its curriculum and research output.

peer_comparison.differentiator: Distinguished by its <cite id="5">massive digital reach</cite> and <cite id="8">zero-cost fundraising efficiency</cite>.

strengths.detail: The organization operates with a <cite id="8">fundraising efficiency of $0.00 per $1 raised</cite>, indicating that it acquires donors with virtually no overhead cost.
Yaqeen maintains <cite id="9">12.0 months of working capital</cite>, providing a resilient financial cushion to sustain long-term research projects.
The institute holds an <cite id="10">overall score of 96.0/100 from Charity Navigator</cite> and has earned a <cite id="11">Platinum Seal of Transparency from Candid</cite>.

strengths_deep_dive: Yaqeen's strength lies in its ability to convert intellectual capital into massive public engagement. By focusing on <cite id="12">capacity building and research</cite>, the institute has created a scalable model where a single research paper or video series can reach millions globally. Their <cite id="13">13-member board</cite> provides strong governance oversight, which is reflected in their <cite id="14">96/100 accountability score</cite> from independent evaluators. Furthermore, the organization has shown steady financial maturity with a <cite id="15">3-year revenue CAGR of 3.5%</cite>, indicating stable growth in its donor base.
rich_narrative.summary: Yaqeen Research Institute Inc is a prominent research-focused organization dedicated to addressing contemporary challenges through <cite id="1">high-quality Islamic research and educational resources</cite>. The institute operates at a significant scale, reporting <cite id="2">$8,759,241 in total revenue</cite> for the 2023 fiscal year. Its primary output includes scholarly books, research papers, and multimedia content designed to <cite id="3">revive the essence of Islamic orthodoxy</cite> in the modern world. The organization demonstrates exceptional financial efficiency, maintaining a <cite id="4">86.1% program expense ratio</cite> according to recent filings, ensuring that donor contributions are directed almost entirely toward its core mission of research and education. Beyond textual resources, Yaqeen has achieved massive digital reach, documenting <cite id="5">20,500,000 digital views for its Ramadan series</cite> and supporting <cite id="6">37,075 students through its curriculum</cite>. The institute is recognized as <cite id="7">zakat-eligible</cite>, providing a unique avenue for Muslim donors to support intellectual dawah and educational infrastructure through their obligatory giving.
